def_cn: (表示某情况自过去某时间点或某个事件以来一直持续到现在)自…以后，从…以来
def_en: You use since when you are mentioning a time or event in the past and indicating that a situation has continued from then until now.

def_cn: (表示某事件或情况从过去某时间或某个事件之后一直发生)自…以来,在…之后
def_en: You use since to mention a time or event in the past when you are describing an event or situation that has happened after that time.

def_cn: (表示过去某事或某情况发生后不久又发生了另一件事)此后，后来
def_en: When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time.
If you say that something has long since happened, you mean that it happened a long time ago.
You use since to introduce reasons or explanations.
